ingredients: 1×28 oz can San Marzano tomatoes, lightly crushed
1½ c red wine or dry white wine
3 tsp sea salt + more to taste
1 tsp red pepper flakes + more to taste
2 tbsp Sicilian oregano, crumbled or 1 sprig rosemary 10 thyme sprigs
2 tbsp Sicilian oregano, crumbled or 1 sprig rosemary 10 thyme sprigs
2 tbsp Sicilian oregano, crumbled or 1 sprig rosemary 10 thyme sprigs
⅓ c Italian parsley, roughly chopped
